title: Systems of Linear Equations
body: Your roommate, Sarah, offered to buy groceries for you and your other roommate. The total bill was $82. She forgot to save the individual receipts but remembered that your groceries were $$\$0.05$$ cheaper than half of her groceries, and that your other roommate’s groceries were $$\$2.10$$ more than your groceries.
lesson: 7.2 Systems of Linear Equations: Three Variables
